      • writeMetric

        public void writeMetric(XDROutputBuffer xdr,
                        IGangliaMetadataMessage decl,
                        IGangliaMetricMessage msg)
        Description copied from interface: IGangliaMessageEncoder
        Generate a metric record.

        Note: It is critical that the IGangliaMetricMessage is both internally consistent and consistent with the IGangliaMetadataMessage for that metric.

        Specified by:
        writeMetric in interface IGangliaMessageEncoder
        Parameters:
        xdr - Where to write the record.
        decl - The metadata declaration.
        msg - The metric value message.
